content: any popcorn ch1 this does not count as a st 1sc in the same st working into the middle 3rd skip st from round 15 and in front of the chain from round 16 make a 3trc cluster 3sc around the chain from round 16 3trc cluster in the same st as the previous cluster 1sc in the top of the n ext popcorn repeat 11 more times omitting the last single_crochet join to the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 24x3trc clusters 48sc 9 round 18 white join in any single_crochet from round 17 that was worked into a popcorn in round 16 ch2 this counts as the 1st half_double_crochet 1hdc in each st around join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch do not fasten_off stitch count 72 half_double_crochet round 19 white ch1 this does not count as a st 1sc in the same st fptrc2tog around the 3trc clusters on either side of the popcorn starting with the one on the right skip st 1sc in each of the next 5 sts repeat 11 more times omitting the last single_crochet join to the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 12fptrc2tog 60sc round 20 red join in any st ch2 this counts as the 1st half_double_crochet 1hdc in each st around join to the top of the beginn ing ch2 with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 72hdc round 21 white join aro und the post of any fptrc2tog from round 19 with a standing fptrc skip the st immediately behind the fptrc working blo make 1hdc in each of the next 5 sts fptrc around the next fptrc2tog from round 19 skip st repeat 11 more times omitting the last fptrc join to the beginning fptrc with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch c ount 12fptrc 60hdc round 22 green join in any fptrc ch1 this does not count as a st 1sc in the same st working blo 1sc in each of the nex t 5 sts 1sc through normal loops in the next fptrc repeat 11 more times omitting the last single_crochet join to the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 72sc 10 round 23 white join in any single_crochet worked into a fptrc ch1 this does not count as a st 1sc in the same st 1sc in the next st fptrc back to the right around the fptrc from round 21 skip st 1sc in each of the next 2 sts fptrc forward to the left around the fptrc from round 21 skip st 1sc in each of the next 2 sts repeat 11 more times omitting the last 2sc join to the top of the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch do not fa sten off stitch count 24fptrc 48sc round 24 white ch2 this counts as the 1st half_double_crochet 1hdc in each st around join to the top of the beginning
